devdoc.author: Civic Ledger

addAllocation(uint256,uint256).details: Adds an allocation to an existing water licence

params.volume: Sets the volume of water they are allocated to use
params.waterLicenceId: The index of the licence to add the allocation to
The id of the licence to get the allocation

canTrade(uint256,address,uint256).details: Checks whether a licensee can trade

params.traderAddress: The address of the trader looking to trade using the licensee
params.volume: The volume of water they want to trade
params.waterLicenceId: The index of the licence to check trade restrictions for

canTrade(uint256,address,uint256).return: Returns true if they are able to trade, returns false if not able to trade

getLicenceById(uint256).details: Retrieves a licence by its index

params.id: Id of the licence to retrieve

getLicenceCount().details: Retrieves the number of licences that have been issued

issueLicence(address,string,uint256,uint.details: Issues a new water licence to a licensee address

params.endDate: Licence validity end date - after this date they are not able to trade (can be 0 which means no expiry)
params.licenseeAddress: The address of the licensee to issue a licence to
params.reference: An authority reference for the licence
params.startDate: Licence validity start date - from this date they are able to trade
params.tradingZoneId: The trading zone that they are entitled to trade within

issueLicenceAndAllocate(address,string,u.details: Issues a new water licence to a licensee address

params.endDate: Licence validity end date - after this date they are not able to trade (can be 0 which means no expiry)
params.licenseeAddress: The address of the licensee to issue a licence to
params.reference: An authority reference for the licence
params.startDate: Licence validity start date - from this date they are able to trade
params.tradingZoneId: The trading zone that they are entitled to trade within
params.volume: Amount of water to allocate to the licence initially

licenceExists(address,string,uint256).details: Checks whether a licence has been issued with the passed details

params.licenseeAddress: The address of the licensee to check
params.reference: The authority reference for the licence
params.tradingZoneId: The trading zone of the licence

licenceExists(address,string,uint256).return: Returns true if the licence exists and false if it doesn't

devdoc.title: Allows water authorities to issue/revoke water licences and manage their entitlements/allocations.
